Package com.prckt.krowemarf.components.Messenger

Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.prckt.krowemarf.components.Messenger.Messenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _Component, _Messenger, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Messenger
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements _Messenger
    The Messenger component allow client to send instant _DefaultMessage to other client
